matcher.options: SPF Aligned Fail & NOT ARC Pass

targets.alias: SPF Aligned Fail & NOT ARC Pass
targets.query: header_from.keyword:$fromdomain AND spf_aligned:false AND NOT policy_overrides.comment.keyword:arc=pass

matcher.options: DKIM Aligned Fail & NOT ARC Pass

targets.alias: DKIM Aligned Fail & NOT ARC Pass
targets.query: header_from.keyword:$fromdomain AND dkim_aligned:false AND NOT policy_overrides.comment.keyword:arc=pass
header_from.keyword:$fromdomain AND passed_dmarc:false AND NOT policy_overrides.comment.keyword:arc=pass
